item.title: Copy Files to a user's Desktop Using MSI installer
item.description: Scenario You don’t want to use UEM/DEM, and you want files made avaibile to the user when they sign in. Or you have some files you need to get out to endpoints and don’t want to write a script to copy the files from the SCCM cache to the location. Sometimes you have to do things outside ofthe box. However these file don’t install they just need to be copied to a directory, such as the default/public desktop.
